name: Eternal Love
content: We got a flame that will last forever
我们拥有能燃烧永远的爱火
There's no way we can push it away
因为他们永远不会碎裂我们的爱
我们连结的纽带绝不会断裂
Do you believe in the power
We can make it if we stay together
如果我们永远相守 我们就能拥有
We can start at the end of time
我们也可以在时光的尽头重头开始
And there will never be another one
永远不会有另一个人替代你
And it's burning in your name
在你的名字间炙热燃烧
Even through the sands of time
No matter if you're near of far
我们连结的纽带绝不会断裂
We can start at the end of time
我们也可以在时光的尽头重头开始
And there will never be another one
永远不会有另一个人替代你
And it's burning in your name
在你的名字间炙热燃烧
Even through the sands of time
And there'll never be another one
我们拥有能燃烧永远的爱火
在你的名字间炙热燃烧
Even through the sands of time
